title: SkyBlock by BioJawn [Survival]
briefDescription: The Sky Block You've all been waiting for has Finally Arrived!Based on the Original Skyblock and Skyblock 4 Map By DrTrogalstaid. With 10 Overworld Biomes This ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
The Sky Block You?ve all been waiting for has Finally Arrived!
Based on the Original Skyblock and Skyblock 4 Map By DrTrogalstaid. With 10 Overworld Biomes This map has a lot to offer including a Behavior Pack for special Mob Drops and Trades!
Visit the Beach and the Desert! The Beach is surrounded by Warm Ocean, Ocean, and Cold Ocean Biomes.
The Jungle should have plenty of wood to get you on your way.
Water Freezes at Spawn Level in the Snowy Tundra. (Polar bears maybe?)
The Nether has a roof and walls (400 x 400 blocks) but No Floor or netherrack.
Two fortresses are within the Nether. One of them has one extra Lava!
Find the End Portal Frame in the Nether.

title: Flood Challenge
briefDescription: Every 5 minutes the water level will automatically rise by 12 blocks! This map was inspired by a video from youtuber Wilbur Plays, in which he manually ...

crawledImageUrls.text: Every 5 minutes the water level will automatically rise by 12 blocks! This map was inspired by a video from youtuber Wilbur Plays, in which he manually set a timer and pasted in commands to make the water level rise. In this map, it is entirely automated. I made this in bedrock edition so you can play with your friends on xbox one, nintendo switch, and pocket edition! Good luck and have fun!

title: Skyblock Islands v.0.1.2

title: Sky Islands Survival!
briefDescription: Sky Islands Survival is a skyblock map for noobs. Almost everything is done for you, and there is really no end to it, and you ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
Sky Islands Survival is a skyblock map for noobs. Almost everything is done for you, and there is really no end to it, and you can never access the End.
I always loved skyblock maps and I decided to create my own. The void world template was by DanRobzProbz (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_imjIrt_UI4). I put my best effort into this map and I hope you enjoy it! In this map there are 2 spawners: Cows and Sheep. The sheep are mainly to be used as wool for a bed and the cows for food. In the starting chest, there is one item (aside from the note) which is flint and steel. That item is definitely not used to make the nether portal?
This map is mainly for noobs, since (as mentioned earlier) nearly everything is done for you. I hope you enjoy playing this map as I did making it!

title: Cool Cave House
briefDescription: This is a very cool cave house with three rooms and two of them are secret! You can play it in survival or creative! And ...

crawledImageUrls.text: This is a very cool cave house with three rooms and two of them are secret! You can play it in survival or creative! And you can?t drowned in water! There is a little redstone but not extreme.

crawledImageUrls.text:
This is a fully functional Survival Game/Battle Royale map with a working border and random loot that will change every time the map is reloaded. There are structures and mountains to explore and plenty of loot for everyone.
Overhead map.
Mountain house
The start room has 2 options that can be changed by flipping these levers
The start area has a small outdoor location for players to wait

crawledImageUrls.text: Stone Blocked is kinda like skyblock but instead you are under ground. You start off with a wooden pickaxe and some other materials and you are ready to explore the endless stone world.

title: DeathCore II: Unknown Waters
briefDescription: Unknown Waters is the second entry in the DeathCore CTM series. The map immensely features deep waters that the player must survive in while many ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
Unknown Waters is the second entry in the DeathCore CTM series. The map immensely features deep waters that the player must survive in while many monsters lurk in these deep depths.
Unknown Waters is the second entry in the DeathCore CTM series. The map immensely features deep waters that the player must survive in.
Trapped underneath a labryinthine flooded cavern, the player must live off fish and the resources they have in order to have a chance at survival, and possibly escape. Can you survive the deep waters or will it become your watery grave?
Some mobs are tougher as they pose stranger abilities than their vanilla versions. For instance, Endermen gives the player blindness when in proximity of one and Husks are invisible, but they have obvious looking pumpkin heads.
You can also make the game more difficult and challenging thru challenge modes.

title: MystiQ Skyblock
briefDescription: This is the best skyblock map you'll ever experience. You can make crazy things because you'll have so many different custom goals and challenges, and ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
This is the best skyblock map you?ll ever experience. You can make crazy things because you?ll have so many different custom goals and challenges, and an ore shop for coins. It?s really amazing, try it out!
Features:
Make any farms and mob traps, collect experience and items, make the custom goals and earn expensive items, make an enchanting table and craft a crazy armor and at the end you have to fight the dragon.
Made by JustNikooo

title: Chunk Survival ? New Edition
briefDescription: Do you enjoy chunk survival maps? Here's a new style of it. This time there will be multiple chunks to survive on them. Just one ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
Do you enjoy chunk survival maps? Here?s a new style of it. This time there will be multiple chunks to survive on them. Just one thing: Don?t fall in the void!
In contrary of other chunk survival maps, this one has multiple chunks. More chunks, more fun!

In this map, the time reset to 0 when you die to avoid being spawn-killed by mobs if it?s the night.
These are real chunks extracted from a normal Minecraft world. You can find ores on the underground, one chunk even has a zombie spawner!
Map by 32Vache. If you wanna restart the map, just download it again from MCPEDL.

title: SkyLayer Survival 2 (Original Hardcore)

crawledImageUrls.text: A comeback of the tallest survival challenge tower! The SkyLayer Survival Challenge! In this map you have two choice! First, is too survire and do all the archivement. Second, challenge to your friend who is the fastest player who touch the lowest floor!

If you have no idea what this map is Searching ?Skylayer Survival? On youtube, many youtuber have played it! Like Unspeakableplay, Prestons, RageElixer? and many!!! Thank so much to them! I cannot stop laughing! Mostly because prestonz!!!

As you know what to do? Then jump in and do it!!!

title: Mob?s Skyblock
briefDescription: Welcome to my skyblock, Mob's Skyblock. If you are thinking of downloading this, just know that this is not easy, but it's also not hard. ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
Welcome to my skyblock, Mob?s Skyblock. If you are thinking of downloading this, just know that this is not easy, but it?s also not hard. There are many islands and each is unique. There should be some sort of treasure in this world, but who knows? Anyways, please try this map for yourself, I think you?ll enjoy it.
A Chinese-styled restaurant. It is recommended to visit if you need food.
This is the Ice Sink Island. That large ice sculpture is, of course, a large sink. Be careful, it is full of strays.
This is heck with double toothpicks. There are a lot of Wither Skeletons. What a blazin? hot place to be in.
What a beautiful forest.

title: Progressive Skyblock
briefDescription: Welcome to Progressive Skyblock! A unique map experience you're bound to remember and want to play again alone or with friends! Have fun and leave ...

crawledImageUrls.text: Welcome to Progressive Skyblock! A unique map experience you?re bound to remember and want to play again alone or with friends! Have fun and leave a rating! Enjoy your stay.

Map credits EffoVex ? Map builder CtrlAltCuteness ? Command block expert Jaune ? Custom Villager trades
Progressive Skyblock is a custom built map made by the people listed above. It was made in the hopes of providing a fun skyblock experience but with more resources and more opportunities for things that would otherwise be impossible in standard skyblock. You can go to both the Nether and the End dimensions like in normal survival. The map took about 2 full days to build and do the commands and custom villager trades. There are plenty of things hidden around on the various surrounding islands that the player can collect to help surviving easier.
You spawn on this island and bridge out and explore!
Wow! A pre built home! I wonder what?s inside? or perhaps? Under??
Ooh a spooky bone island!
Oh! Doesn?t that take you to the shop?! I hear you can get more resources from there!
Oh! Hey! A plane! I wonder what could be inside! Hopefully something good!
And?? What?s this? It appears to be some sort of flying ship? And there are weird sounds coming from it!
